titles.title: Open Space Preservation Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income gain on the sale or exchange of certain farmland the use of which is restricted in perpetuity to use as farmland.
Open Space Preservation Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Open Space Preservation Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale or exchange of farmland if there is a covenant prohibiting any use other than as farmland.
